typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> employees
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Department
employees aggregate(groupBy(deptid),
	totalemployees = count(empid)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Department join(Aggregate1@deptid == Department@deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		deptid = Aggregate1@deptid,
		totalemployees,
		deptid = Department@deptid,
		Depname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
